long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Remove YouTube Shorts from your feed and enjoy distraction-free browsing with a simple toggle button. This open-source extension helps you focus on longer content without short video interruptions.

Features
- Toggle On/Off: Control whether YouTube Shorts are visible with a single click.
- Focus on Long-Form Content: Avoid addictive short video distractions.
- Easy to Use: Simple, user-friendly interface.
- Multi-Language Support: Available in several languages for global accessibility.

Languages Available
- English
- Brazilian Portuguese
- Spanish
- German
- Italian
- French

Stay focused and enjoy YouTube without distractions!
